original_text:
The fatherless child is snatched from the breast;
    the infant of the poor is seized for a debt.
korean_text: 어떤 사람은 고아를 어머니의 품에서 빼앗으며 가난한 자의 옷을 볼모 잡으므로

sentences.original_text: The fatherless child is snatched from the breast
the infant of the poor is seized for a debt
sentences.korean_translation: 가난한 자의 어린 아이는 빚 때문에 잡혀가나니
